General.Name: ABC Taiwan Electronics
General.Description: ABC Taiwan Electronics Corp. engages in the manufacturing and sale of electronic products in the United States, Germany, China, Taiwan, and internationally. The company offers filter coils, line filters, power inductors, radial inductors, SMD line filters, SMD power inductors, shielded SMD power inductors, semi-shielded SMD power inductors, multilayer chip inductors, multilayer chip beads, wound chip inductors, and axial inductors; transformers; MPC heat-sinks; connectors; and stamping and plastic molding products, as well as LED lighting products. Its products are used in consumer electronic products, communication electronic products, computer and computing peripheral equipment, industrial electronic equipment, and automotive electronic equipment applications. ABC Taiwan Electronics Corp. was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 98, Huandong Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 32665
